use_correction.description: Indicates whether the autobias correction feature should be used or not.
use_correction.title: Use Correction

window.description: The amount of trials to consider to calculate the animal bias.
window.title: Window

cutoff_bias.description: The minimum |bias| value from which the side rewards start to be corrected.
cutoff_bias.title: Cutoff Bias

performance_threshold.description: The minimum performance value for which the side rewards are not corrected.
performance_threshold.title: Performance Threshold

slope_multiplier.description: A multiplying factor to the slope of the increasing reward amount side (corresponds to the non-biased side).
slope_multiplier.title: Slope Multiplier

mean.description: The mean number of trials a biased block should have.
mean.title: Mean

min_value.description: The minimum number of trials that a biased block should have.
min_value.title: Min Value

max_value.description: The maximum number of trials that a biased block should have.
max_value.title: Max Value

is_biased_session.description: Indicates whether the current session will have biased blocks.
is_biased_session.title: Is Biased Session

bias_probability.description: The probability of the preferencial side in a biased block.
bias_probability.title: Bias Probability

block_distributions.description: Contains the parameters of the exponential distribution from which the number of trials in a biased block is sampled.

opto_onset_time.description: Contains parameters related to the Optogenetics Onset Time part of the Fixation Time. The units of each of the parameters is milliseconds.

sound_onset_time.description: Contains parameters related to the Sound Onset Time part of the Fixation Time. The units of each of the parameters is milliseconds.

voltage.description: The voltage to use in the TTL signal.
voltage.title: Voltage

power.description: The power with which the animal is stimulated.
power.title: Power

mode.description: Indicates whether the LED port is being used to control an external LED via TTL or if it's controlling a LED directly with the current sources.
mode.title: Mode

use_pulses.description: Indicates whether the optogenetics protocol uses pulses of light (true) or a continuous emission (false).
use_pulses.title: Use Pulses

frequency.description: The frequency of the pulses (Hz). It only works when use_pulses is true.
frequency.title: Frequency

duty_cycle.description: The duty cycle of the pulses (%). It only works when use_pulses is true.
duty_cycle.title: Duty Cycle

use_opto.description: Indicates whether optogenetics is used or not.
use_opto.title: Use Opto

mode.description: Indicates the optogenetics mode used in the current session.
mode.title: Mode

duration.description: The duration of the optogenetics stimulation/inhibition protocol (s).
duration.title: Duration

use_rt.description: Indicates whether the optogenetics stimulation/inhibition should stop when the animal leaves the poke (true) or not (false).
use_rt.title: Use Rt

ramp_mode.description: Indicates the ramp mode used in the optogenetics protocol. It only works if the LED is not configured to use pulses.
ramp_mode.title: Ramp Mode

ramp_time.description: The duration of the ramp of the optogenetics protocol (ms). It only works when use_pulses is false.
ramp_time.title: Ramp Time

led0.description: The optogenetics protocol that LED 0 executes.

led1.description: The optogenetics protocol that LED 1 executes.

delta.description: The increment to the base value every trial a certain condition is met until the target value is reached.
delta.title: Delta

base_amount.description: The amount of reward delivered to the animal (uL).
base_amount.title: Base Amount

probability.description: The probability of the animal receiving reward given a right answer.
probability.title: Probability

number.description: The number of the current session.
number.title: Number

experimenter.description: The person who trained the animal in the current session.
experimenter.title: Experimenter

duration.description: The duration of the session (in the hh:mm:ss format).
duration.title: Duration

type.description: The number of the session type.
type.title: Type

starting_trial_number.description: The number of the first trial of the session.
starting_trial_number.title: Starting Trial Number

block_number.description: The number of the first block of the session.
block_number.title: Block Number

starting_training_level.description: The training level the animal will start in the current session.
starting_training_level.title: Starting Training Level

last_training_level.description: The last training level the animal is allowed to progress to in the current session.
last_training_level.title: Last Training Level

pseudo_random_side.description: Indicates whether the correct side is picked pseudo-randomly (true) or randomly (false). If it's picked pseudo-randomly, a shuffled array with equal amounts of -1's (left) and 1's (right) of size 2 * `max_side` is created and it's cycled through - a new shuffled array is generated when the end of the array is reached.
pseudo_random_side.title: Pseudo Random Side

max_side.description: The maximum amount of elements representing the left or right side in the pseudo-random array for when the side is picked pseudo-randomly.
max_side.title: Max Side

abl_block.description: Indicates whether the the same ABL should be used across the current block.
abl_block.title: Abl Block

short_duration_ratio.description: The percentage of short duration trials in a session.
short_duration_ratio.title: Short Duration Ratio

short_durations.description: The list containing the possible sound durations in a short duration trial in ms.
short_durations.title: Short Durations

delta.description: The increment to the base value every trial a certain condition is met until the target value is reached.
delta.title: Delta

batch.description: The batch to which the current animal belongs to.
batch.title: Batch

fixation_time.description: Contains parameters related to the fixation time.

reaction_time.description: Contains parameters related to the reaction time. The units of each of the parameters is seconds.

lnp_time.description: Contains parameters related to the LNP (Lateral Nose Poke) time. The units of each of the parameters is seconds.

reward.description: Contains the parameters that configure the reward delivery.

autobias_correction.description: Contains parameters related to the autobias correction algorithm.

biased_session.description: Contains the parameter to configure a biased session.
